channel.title: Comments on: CNN tells another lie
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: mohammed
item.dc:creator: mohammed
item.description: the reason why i am writing this note is that,the world is not realising what america is trying to acchieve by fighting our innocents people accross the world!!! America is doing this to show that she has the power to throw away any president she wants! That should not be happening because the muslims are not the only enemies to america!!! I hate what america is doing and I hate how our united nation is allowing america doing what she likes to the islam!!! there are many nations who dont like america but things like this have never to them! this shows that the UN is involved in this terror act against islam! thank you but be careful!
item.content:encoded:
the reason why i am writing this note is that,the world is not realising what america is trying to acchieve by fighting our innocents people accross the world!!! America is doing this to show that she has the power to throw away any president she wants! That should not be happening because the muslims are not the only enemies to america!!!
I hate what america is doing and I hate how our united nation is allowing america doing what she likes to the islam!!!
there are many nations who dont like america but things like this have never to them!
this shows that the UN is involved in this terror act against islam! thank you but be careful!
